review: The streaming stick works well and was easy to set up.  I previously had a Roku 2 and was quite happy with it.  The reason I purchased the streaming stick is it supports screen mirroring from my phone and this is a neat feature for watching YouTube, etc.  The reason for the 2 star review is that the remote control does not work well at all.  It constantly looses it's connectivity.  I have found that I remove the battery cover, take out the batteries and re-install them it reconnects and functions fine...for about 30 minutes.  While watching TV through Roku I sometimes have to repeat this process 3-4 times and evening.  I called customer support and they walked me through the process (this took about 40 minutes on the phone) of disconnecting the remote and then pairing it again with the streaming stick.  I was excited...this seemed to work....for about a day.  Now I'm back again where I started.  I never had this problem with the Roku 2 remote.  Also the Roku 2 remote took 4 AAA batteries, had a jack for headphones and felt generally of better quality.  Why make such a poor remote for such an otherwise good device.  Bad! Bad! Remote....
author: Jeff Schmidt
